{{Wireless embedded system |brand=USRobotics |model=USR8022 |revision= |upc=738168034253 |ean= |asin=B00006HYNH |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/13/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=BW3-DB-6802-L1, IOU1021S01 |ic_id=550A-15005 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model=CX82110 |cpu1_cspeed=132 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV800BB-90EC |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=GLT |ram1_model=GLT5640L16-6TC |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (32-bit),Parallel |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 20-pad header,, |serial=yes,, 9-pin header,, DE-9 |wi1_module=DBTel DB-6802 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (32-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=ACX100 |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model=KS8721B |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=USR8022 |default_ssid_regex=^USR8022$ |default_ip=192.168.123.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:C0:49 |oui_eth=00:C0:49 }} {{TagLine|22Mbps Wireless Cable/DSL Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=USRobotics|vs_id=8022}}
FCC IDs for USR8022s appear to differ.. they may be BW3-DB-6802-L1, :IOU1021SO1, or possibly something else.
The default SSID is presumably '''USR8022''' (backed by ~2000 WiGLE :entries and in the manual as the entry on the config page). The default password is ''blank''.
*[http://www.tecchannel.de/a/test-zwoelf-mehrwert-dsl-router-mit-802-11b-wlan,401788,27 On '''TecChannel'''] *[https://bandaancha.eu/foros/usr-8022-89488 On '''Bandaancha'''] :• CPU: Conexant CX82110 (ARM940T @132MHz) :• Flash: AMD AM29LV800 (1MB) :• Switch: Kendin KS8995E (5-ports) :• Eth PHY: Kendin KS8721B (2x Eth) :• I/O: Winbond W83877TF (Par./Ser.) :• PLD: Altera EMP3032A (32x)
